actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Select Committee on Ethics, S. Rept. 95-1320.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A resolution amending the Standing Rules of the Senate to allow the defraying of office expenses incurred in connection with official duties from funds derived from certain political committees.

summary.text: Amends rule XLVI of the Standing Rules of the Senate to provide that an unofficial office account does not include funds from contributions to: (1) the Member's principal campaign committee; (2) the Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee and the National Republican Senatorial Committee; and (3) the national or State political party committee with which the Member is affiliated.

titles.title: A resolution amending the Standing Rules of the Senate to allow the defraying of office expenses incurred in connection with official duties from funds derived from certain political committees.
